sentences.en: "Rid Of Me" is harrowing, uneasy listening.
sentences.cn: 《弃我而去》这首歌非常伤感，听起来很晦涩。

sentences.en: An uneasy calm has settled over Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶归于一种不稳定的平静之中。

sentences.en: An uneasy calm is reported to be prevailing in the area.
sentences.cn: 据报道,该地区弥漫着一种令人不安的平静.

sentences.en: He looked uneasy and refused to answer questions.
sentences.cn: 他看上去焦虑不安，拒绝回答问题。

sentences.en: He sniffed, fidgeting in discomfort, uneasy at the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他吸了吸鼻子，对这项提议感到窘迫不安，心烦意乱。

sentences.en: He was beginning to feel distinctly uneasy about their visit.
sentences.cn: 他对他们的造访明显地感到不安起来。

sentences.en: His triumph was overshadowed by an uneasy sense of foreboding.
sentences.cn: 他的胜利因为一种令人不安的不祥预感蒙上了阴影。

sentences.en: I had an uneasy feeling that he was going to spoil it.
sentences.cn: 我有种不安的感觉，觉得他会把事情搞糟。

sentences.en: In the moment of triumph I felt uneasy.
sentences.cn: 在成功的那一刻我反而感到了不安。

sentences.en: Mollie gave an uneasy little titter.
sentences.cn: 莫莉不自在地轻声干笑了一下。

sentences.en: Ninety percent of those questioned felt uneasy about nuclear power.
sentences.cn: 受访者中有90%的人对核能感到忧虑。

sentences.en: She eventually fell into an uneasy sleep.
sentences.cn: 她终于睡着了，但睡得并不踏实。

sentences.en: She felt uneasy in the unfamiliar surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她在陌生的环境中感到局促不安。

sentences.en: She had an uneasy feeling that they were still following her.
sentences.cn: 她有一种他们仍在跟踪她的不安感觉.

sentences.en: There is an uneasy relationship between us and the politicians.
sentences.cn: 我们和那些政治家之间的关系很不稳固。

sentences.en: This is an uneasy travel book.
sentences.cn: 这本旅游手册不是很好懂。

sentences.en: We were all a touch uneasy, I think.
sentences.cn: 我想我们都稍有点不自在。

words.tran_cn: 不自在地；不稳定地；心神不安地

trans.tran_cn: 心神不安的，不稳定的，不舒服的
trans.tran_en: worried or slightly afraid because you think that something bad might happen
